articles.author: Polo Sandoval, Melissa Alonso, Emma Tucker, Andrew Millman
articles.title: 3 American women missing after crossing Mexico border 2 weeks ago - CNN
articles.description: Three American women are believed to be missing in Mexico after they crossed the US border from Texas to sell clothes at a flea market over two weeks ago, police told CNN on Saturday.
articles.content:
Three American women are believed to be missing in Mexico after they crossed the US border from Texas to sell clothes at a flea market over two weeks ago, police told CNN on Saturday.
